QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Icecrown!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Officer Van Rossem in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
The Valiance Expedition needs more adventurers to bolster their assault on assault Icecrown Citadel and Arthas himself.
It is time to make the Lich King pay for his crimes.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Officer Van Rossem in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Officer Van Rossem in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: The Valiance Expedition is ready to strike at the heart of the Scourge, $c. Are you up to the challenge?
